content.rendered:
COVID-19 has only widened the gender gap across our nation’s workforce as women are exiting at higher rates than men, leaving fewer women to get on track to become future leaders.

During this webinar, Christine Cruzvergara, Handshake’s Chief Education Strategy Officer, and Christen Steele, Director of Computing Career Services at Georgia Tech, discuss the findings from the first Handshake Network Trends report, “Gender, Equity, and Gen Z,” and share key takeaways for colleges and universities and employers.

View all career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Findings From Our First Handshake Network Trends Report
